scripts.lint: eslint src/**/*.{js,json} tests/**/*.js scripts/**/*.js && jsonlint -jsV ./schema.json --trim-trailing-commas --enforce-double-quotes ./src/technologies/ && jsonlint -js --trim-trailing-commas --enforce-double-quotes ./src/categories.json
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix src/**/*.{js,json} tests/**/*.js scripts/**/*.js && jsonlint -isV ./schema.json --trim-trailing-commas --enforce-double-quotes ./src/technologies/ && jsonlint -is --trim-trailing-commas --enforce-double-quotes ./src/categories.json
scripts.build: yarn run validate && yarn run convert && node ./scripts/build.js
